content:
Dear All,

I think that this PR is ready: does anyone have any further comments?

Eric has worked hard to fix all the issues that my initial version had and made it much better!

It is currently blocking a couple of other PRs in the direction of proving no_zero_divisors for (some) add_monoid_algebras:

  • #15983, for no zero divisors in general, (technically not blocked by the PR, but in the same batch);
  • #16217, for some covariant_classes;
  • 16157, for bringing everything together.

Thanks!
(I'm happy with this, but since I steered the development a bit someone else should double-check)
